additional_notes: The document appears to be a handwritten log or record of activities involving inmate Epstein (#76318-054) on July 9, 2019. The log details Epstein's movements and interactions with the author from 6:00 PM to 9:15 PM. There are redactions marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)' throughout the right margin, indicating potentially sensitive information has been obscured.
